column6: As Matt tries to deal with the changes in his life, and find a way to move forward, a threat from his past begins to creep toward daylight. And with the post-Civil War fallout all around him, the price of being Daredevil just got even higher.
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | penciller (cover):Marko Djurdjevic | inker:Stefano Gaudiano | colorist:Matt Hollingsworth | penciller:Michael Lark | letterer:Cory Petit
